summary: A highly skilled Field Service and Technical Support Engineer with a Master's in Robotics and Artificial Vision. Proven expertise in commissioning, QA, and customer support for advanced technological systems, including industrial AI vision and drone technology. Seeking to leverage technical and problem-solving skills in a challenging Field Service Engineer role.

work_experience.title: Technical Support Engineer
work_experience.company_description: This company is divided into three areas. It is dedicated to drone consulting (specifically, aircraft control), markets products to increase drone safety, and is developing a helicopter-type drone for surveillance and firefighting.

bullet_points.text: I led the QA department to validate the correct functioning of the systems prior to their commercialization.
I led the installation of the systems at the customer's premises (more than 10 aircraft successfully installed).

work_experience.title: Field Service Engineer
work_experience.company_description: This company is divided into three areas. It is dedicated to drone consulting (specifically, aircraft control), markets products to increase drone safety, and is developing a helicopter-type drone for surveillance and firefighting.

bullet_points.text: Performed on-site commissioning for over 20 industrial artificial vision machines designed for food classification (olives, citrus, blueberries).
Engineered and implemented field improvements that successfully reduced equipment breakdowns by 25%, primarily enhancing product classification accuracy.
Collaborated closely with the R&D department to validate and deploy emerging artificial vision technologies in real-world environments.

work_experience.title: Customer Support Engineer
work_experience.company_description: This company is divided into three areas. It is dedicated to drone consulting (specifically, aircraft control), markets products to increase drone safety, and is developing a helicopter-type drone for surveillance and firefighting.

bullet_points.text: Trained and onboarded over 30 clients, facilitating their adaptation and successful use of a customized software tool.
Provided level 1 and level 2 technical support, consistently resolving approximately 40 support tickets per week.

education.degree: Master in Robotics and Artificial Vision
education.details: Specialized training in image/video analysis with OpenCV, pneumatic circuit design, and PLC programming (Siemens, Weidmuller) using TIA Portal.

bullet_points.text: Actively participated in the FSUPV team, contributing to the chassis and engine design for a Formula 1-style competition car.
Competed in several IDEASUPV entrepreneurship competitions, winning multiple awards for innovative projects.
